title: FAO Animal Health Vaccination Campaign Against PPR in Syria

tasks.task: Conduct a PPR vaccination campaign in rural Damascus.
subtasks: Plan and coordinate with international donors (FAO, Russian project, DFID, ORCHER).
Ensure availability of 8 million vaccine doses within two to three weeks.
Manage cold chain logistics for temperature-sensitive vaccine storage.
Vaccinate 180,000 herders and small-scale livestock keepers.

tasks.task: Achieve zero hunger through successful disease eradication.
subtasks: Monitor and assess vaccine administration progress.
Communicate campaign updates and donor cooperation.
